title: Strengthening Web Development Practice Competencies: Collaborative Learning Through Nature of Science (NOS) and Historical Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core characteristics of the nature of science (NOS)—tentativeness, social context, and creativity—by analyzing historical scientific cases (Archaeopteryx research).
Learners can enhance their NOS-related argumentation skills based on peer feedback during collaborative learning.

Learners develop ≥1 mobile application prototype using smartphone-based development tools (Android Studio, Flutter, etc.) and achieve "excellent" ratings in ≥4 of 5 evaluation criteria (e.g., UI/UX, functionality, code quality) in weekly formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
